channel.title: My Personal Stock News

item.title: [INTC] 3 Reasons to Buy Intel Stock Right Now
item.description: Panther Lake, booming demand for server CPUs, and the foundry opportunity line up to make Intel a strong buy.

item.description: These AI leaders could soon join a highly exclusive group.

item.title: [AAPL] Taiwan’s Flagship Chip Maker Charts a Future Beyond Taiwan
item.description: TSMC has for decades provided a “Silicon Shield” to its namesake island. Now it sees both business and geopolitical reasons for going big in the U.S.

item.description: Coming up: Trump speech at Davos, Martin Luther King Jr. holiday, PCE inflation report, GDP update, and earnings from Netflix, Intel, and more.

item.title: [BARC.L] Will humanoids be the growth engine of the 21st century?
item.description: Investing.com -- Humanoid robots are moving rapidly from experimental prototypes to real-world workers, a shift Barclays says could redefine global labor markets and industrial supply chains.

item.title: [AAPL] YouTuber MKBHD Hails Tesla Model Y Performance, Calls EV Giant's Self-Driving Technology 'The Best'
item.description: YouTuber Marques Brownlee, aka MKBHD, has shared his thoughts on the Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) Model Y Performance trim, as well as the company's self-driving technology. Tesla Self-Driving Is The Best Ever, MKBHD Says The YouTuber, in a review of the Model Y Performance on Thursday, hailed the crossover's software on the 16-inch touchscreen infotainment display, which is also a real-time representation of the car. "This is the best software in a car that is not Android Auto or Apple CarPlay," bo

item.title: [AAPL] Bank of America revamps Alphabet stock after Google enters two key partnerships
item.description: Investors are taking a fresh look at Google, as new partnerships tied to its Gemini models help push the stock higher. On Jan. 11, Google and Walmart (WMT) said they plan to roll out a new shopping experience inside Google’s Gemini chatbot, highlighting a potential new revenue path for Google. ...

item.title: [AAPL] Apple’s (AAPL) AI Roadmap Strengthens With Google Deal, Says Evercore
item.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is one of the Hot AI Stocks to Keep on Your Radar. On January 12, Evercore ISI analyst Amit Daryanani reiterated an Outperform rating on the stock with a $330.00 price target. Firm analysts highlight Apple’s new AI partnership with Google Gemini, citing monetization upside and custom AI experiences ahead. The firm […]

item.title: [INTC] KeyBanc Turns Bullish on Intel (INTC), Citing Server CPU Tightness and Foundry Yield Gains
item.description: Intel Corporation (NASDAQ:INTC) is one of the Trending AI Stocks on Wall Street. On January 13, KeyBanc analyst John Vinh upgraded the stock from Sector Weight to Overweight with a price target of $60.00. Firm analysts see improving foundry yield gains and robust hyperscaler-driven data center demand. Despite several headwinds in the server CPU market, […]

item.title: [INTC] TSMC Says 'No More' To Nvidia: Why That Is Intel's Golden Ticket
item.description: The AI boom just hit a constraint investors don't talk about enough: you can't ship what you can't build. Demand for AI chips is still surging, but the world's leading foundry, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co Ltd (NYSE:TSM), or TSMC, is starting to run out of room. That matters — because when supply, not demand, becomes the bottleneck, the entire power structure of the AI trade begins to shift. When The Kingmaker Runs Out Of Capacity According to a report first published by The Information

item.title: [AAPL] Investors Worried About Large Cap Concentration Risk Have a Great Option in MDY
item.description: The SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust (NYSEARCA:SPY) tells a story of increasing concentration. The S&P 500 has become a technology-dominated index, with information technology representing over a third of its weight. This concentration intensifies at the top, where just three mega-cap tech companies control more than a fifth of the entire index’s value—creating a portfolio ... Investors Worried About Large Cap Concentration Risk Have a Great Option in MDY
